name: Knightly Love
description:
Features:

  • Move ♞.
  • Collect♥.
  • Avoid ✖.

Controls:

WASD to move.

This game was written in 558 characters for Tweet Tweet Jam. The challenge was to build a game that would fit in the length of two tweets (560 characters). You can check out (and mess with) the code in question at https://codepen.io/rmkubik/pen/qQaJjJ.
